meanings.sent1: The library has many loanable books for students to borrow.
meanings.sent2: The loanable tools in the workshop are always in high demand.
meanings.sent3: I never thought my loanable umbrella would become so popular in the office!
meanings.sent4: Her loanable car was like a trusty steed, always ready for an adventure.
meanings.sent5: The loanable laptop gleamed under the bright lights, tempting everyone to use it.

meanings.sent1: The bookstore has a variety of loanable textbooks for students.
meanings.sent2: The loanable bicycles near the park entrance are convenient for visitors.
meanings.sent3: I found a loanable surfboard that made me the envy of the beach!
meanings.sent4: His loanable camera captured moments like a silent observer.
meanings.sent5: The loanable telescope revealed the mysteries of the night sky to curious eyes.
